37 wins & 61 nominations

Mosko (key makeup artist) - Debbie Zoller (key makeup artist) - Tina Hoffman (key makeup artist) - David Quashnick (key makeup artist) - Mike Smithson (key makeup artist) - Hank Edds (key makeup artist) - Kevin Haney (key makeup artist) - Michael Key (key makeup artist) (For episode "Genesis".)
